pages.text: Seen frequently in agility sports, Whippets were originally bred for hunting small game.$(br2)Standing just under a block tall, these speedy dogs come in seven different coats.
These dogs are most commonly found in badlands and savannas. They can also be found in windswept hills, and more rarely in sparse jungles.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Mutton or Rabbit Treat.
